**As a** ...  [role]
**I need** ...  [function]
**So that** ...  [benefit]

**Details & Assumptions:** 
* ...

**Acceptance Criteria:**

```gherkin
Given [some initial state]
When [some event]
Then [some measurable outcome]
```
